A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Misplaced humor\, and huge plot holes. Characters joking around with their droids as hundreds of people are being blown up\, it makes zero sense. I️ love Andy Serkis\, but Snokes CGI face and character in general was built poorly. Love the actors\, and I️ love Mark Hamill\, but not the direction they forced him to go in. Even Hamill is having a difficult time excepting which direction Luke’s character went in. I’m sorry to say it was directed horribly\, and this is coming from someone that thinks Rian Johnson is a great director. Hopefully this is a M. Night Shyamalan “The Last Airbender” moment\, and hopefully Rian will bounce back and make something good again. I️ almost feel like a child for crapping on this movie so much\, especially knowing a lot of my friends loved this movie. No\, I’m not one of those fans that can never be satisfied\, I thought Rough One was an absolute delight\, and I️ cried my little eyes out during it. Not trying to be negative but I️ really was disappointed. I’d rather watch the Phantom Menace. Yep\, I️ said it.
